## DistanceNode class

Calculates the distance between two points

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class DistanceNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns length(a - b), the Euclidean distance between points a and b. Both inputs must be the same vector type (vec2, vec3, or vec4). Always returns a float scalar.
